website_summaries.verdict: Its modern shape and lightweight construction make it a nice alternative to other platforms, especially for consumers on the go.
pros: Stands out for its ergonomic design and ultra-light, 33-lb
Rated for users up to 330 lbs
cons: Only has 20 speed settings, but the vibrations are strong

customer_reviews.title: Can't even turn it on!
customer_reviews.text: Looked pretty in the box. But no plug or convertor, no instructions, no handgrips, etc. Amazon nor the owner are nowhere to be found to help. Total waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary G.

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient machine
customer_reviews.text: I really like this machine,Very convenient, there are 5 modes to choose from, each mode has a different rhythm frequency from slow to fast, which can be selected by remote control.For the first 20 minutes I used P1 and P2, I tried to bend and stand. It works on my thighs and my waist。Every morning and evening each 10 minutes, can see weight loss effect as soon as possible。
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't like to review a product too early. I had the confidence one for 4yrs. My kids broke the power button so I couldn't turn it on. I just decided to get a smaller one so I can hide it from my kids. After much research, I decided to go with this machine. This machine is more powerful than the confidence one I had. This has a higher speed than my old one. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pas Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wow this really works out your body I'm working up to 10 mins which surprised me. This is sturdy, easy to use and is great to for strengthening lower and and back. I like there are different muscles that get worked just by moving your feet in or out on the platform.
customer_reviews.author: Laceystu

customer_reviews.title: Different Power Cable
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to use it because I had to figure out what kind of power cable did I need to get and then where to buy it. If the description included that it had a different Power cable I would have ordered it at the same time to be able to use it when my machine arrived. This is very upsetting. I’m surprise there was no review about this.
customer_reviews.author: vega

customer_reviews.title: Iffy remote
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy using this machine but the remote sucks! I have to reinsert batteries each time I want to use it which is aggravating!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Tabor

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Better than the one at my Gym! My Boyfriend is hooked and he has worked out his entire life. I am getting over the Flu and I swear I feel better after using it. It must increase Lymphatic drainage. I am an RN and I love this machine.
customer_reviews.author: PAB

customer_reviews.title: Completely Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the JUFIT vibration plate about 3 weeks ago, and are very satisfied. We chose the JUFIT because it received consistently strong reviews on most of the sites where I was researching. It is light enough to be easily portable - which we needed for our apartment - while having sturdy construction. It was very easy to set up, and the instructions are very clear. It really is perfect for us, and -again - we are completely satisfied. Stephen Dohrmann & Vivian Lee
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this machine. I recently had a pacemaker installed and I can not use anything that vibrates
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I workout on it and just stand. I have noticed a difference in body with this and other things like exercise and juicing. Toned and better flexibility. The machine has many options.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Our family fights over using it. It holds our weight (not small bunch)! 5-9" to 6-1"; weight accordingly. Although the hand straps are too small for us to use, the average person may benefit from them. Does what it says even when sitting your able to get the benefits of this machine.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: How long am I supposed to use??
customer_reviews.text: I’m hoping this helps with my hips and knees while also aiding in weight loss. However, it doesn’t give me the recommended time for each exercise. I have googled this but still no help with suggested time for exercises. Anyone know?
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Osadchuk

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this platform. I feel so good after I do 10 minutes on it. I am only on level 5 but I will work my way up! Great machine. The only things you have to do is take it out of the box, attach the bands and turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: nittinqueen

customer_reviews.title: Still testing
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my parents to help improve their balance. I've used it some as well. I wish the top had a rubber pad on it. The hard plastic is uncomfortable. My parents have said it's helped with balance and relaxing tense muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H.

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I use it to increase blood flow to the legs
customer_reviews.author: Dr. John

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product to compliment your gym at home
customer_reviews.text: I Lost some Some weight.. It helps my mother to move. (She has vertigo) her muscle legs are getting stronger.. It's a great product to compliment your gym at home..
customer_reviews.author: juan c.

customer_reviews.title: Lesson learned: Consult your doctor before using a vibration platform
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item after suffering a vertigo spell caused by daily use. I had never suffered from vertigo before. Did not realize this was possible until after it had happened and I visited my doctor. I strongly advise that you consult your doctor before beginning to use this or a similar device.
customer_reviews.author: lizzybennet

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: That's awesome!I like it so much!It really works very well!I bought this one for my girl friend.She said when she use it she really could feel hot and easy to get wet.the quality is so so good.Thx a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I got the wrong product!! And this is NOT what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy an adapter
customer_reviews.text: Good machine but doesn’t come with a plug for the US and I’m using a cord from something else. Disappointed they didn’t mention it or I didn’t see it if they did
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Motor locked up and this company wouldn't do anything to replace unit. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: George L.

product_meta.title: JUFIT Vibration Plate Whole Body Exercise Machine with Touch LED Screen Massage Workout Trainer Vibration Platform Max User Weight 330lbs-530lbs
feature_bullets: Blueteeth Music:The vibrating machine is designed with Blueteeth,so you can listen to music,opera,drama during the workout.
Super Wider Touch LED: Bigger LED disply screen help you observe the workout data easily, and the smart LED screen is responsive and easy to operate.

Super Wider Workout Area: Vibration plate's size is up to 29 x 17 x 5 inches,super wider plate offers more exercise area.And three kinds of exercise modes offer you more choices.Walking,jogging,running,only10 minutes workouts every days,you start feeling amazing and loving your body from it.

Massage Ponits & Coatings: Two kinds of foot acupressure massage points bring the benefits of reflexology,You can enjoy the foot magnet massage during the vibration exercise.Advanced coatings is non-slip and dirt resistant.
530 LB MAX User Weight:The Max capaciaty is UP TO 530LB.Double thickened plate adopts the advanced material to make sure the vibrating plate durable and sturdy.
